level.text: A membership interest in a mutual insurance holding company shall not constitute an equity security as defined in § 31-603.
A mutual insurance holding company created under this subchapter shall have the same powers to borrow or assume liability as a reciprocal insurance company organized under District law.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-751.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-112
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-112, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-751.
